Mongolian party delegation winds up Korea visit
     Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party led by its General Secretary D. Idevkhten left here today for home.
 During its stay it toured the tower of the Juche idea, the International Friendship Exhibition, the Monument to Party Founding, the Korean Revolution Museum and other places.

articles.title: Chief director of Pyung Hwa General Motor Company here
articles.content:
Chief director of Pyung Hwa General Motor Company here
     Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation led by Pak Sang Gwon, chief director of the Pyung Hwa General Motor Company, arrived here today to attend a ceremony of commissioning the Pyung Hwa General Motor Works.
 The delegation was met at the airport by Song Ho Gyong, vice-chairman of the Korean Asia-Pacific Peace Committee.
